title: Exemption of Hawaii tourism authority from administrative supervision of boards and commissions
context: ยง201B-5 Exemption of Hawaii tourism authority from administrative supervision of boards and commissions. Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, the authority shall be exempt from section 26-35 with the exception of section 26-35(a)(2), (3), (7), (8) and subsection (b). [L 1998, c 156, pt of ยง2; am L 2004, c 16, ยง2; am L 2005, c 22, ยง4]
